p: Ethnoveterinary surveys conducted so far in Ethiopia indicate that several traditional healers use medicinal plants for the treatment of various animal health problems including the treatment of helminth infection. 7, 12â€“ 14 However, very few efforts have been made to scientifically screen and evaluate the anthelminthic effect of condensed tannins. Therefore, the aim of this study was to investigate the in vitro anthelminthic activities of selected condensed tannin plants on the egg and larval development of Haemonchus contortus.
